stimulusHtml:
In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.


Respond to parts a, b, and c.

  1. Briefly describe one cause of the Seven Years’ War (French and Indian War).

  2. Briefly explain how economic policies in the British North American colonies from 1763 to 1776 were similar to economic policies in British North American colonies before the Seven Years’ War.

  3. Briefly explain how economic policies in British North American colonies changed from 1763 to 1776 as a result of the Seven Years’ War.
